## Summary

```{r}
by(iris[,c(1,3)], iris$Species, FUN = summary)
```


```{r}
aggregate(cbind(iris$Sepal.Length,iris$Petal.Length)~iris$Species, 
          data = iris, FUN = summary)
```

```{r}
x = c(1,2,3,NA)
sum(x)
sum(x, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(x)
mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
var(x)
var(x, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(x)
sd(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```
